title: My Baby Brother
story: Good morning, Jennifer. Hi Michelle. How are you? I'm happy. How about you? Me, too. Who is that? That's my baby brother Paul. He's cute. How old is he? He is only three years old. I wish I had a baby brother.
summary: Two friends talk about their happiness and one of them introduces her cute baby brother who is three years old, making the other friend wish she had a baby brother too.
image: An illustration of two friends, Jennifer and Michelle, standing together and pointing at a baby boy named Paul.
